resources.string: Wake lock permission not enabled.\n\n To enable wake lock permission on your android device, click "OK" below or follow the following path \"Settings\" >> \"Apps & notifications\" >> \"SEE ALL # APPS\" >> \"AlwaysOnWidget\" >> \"Permissions\" >> \"Wake Lock\" and then toggle on the permission
To terminate a stay awake session, turn the device screen off
Wake lock permission to toggle screen awake needed.
Wake lock permission to toggle screen awake denied.
Wake lock permission to toggle screen awake granted.
